name: Tiny Racer #nocomfortjam16
description:
Tiny Racer is a short racing game made for No Comfort Jam.

Race against 3 other AI cars in this 3 lap race and try to win.

WASD to control the car.

Mouse click to navigate menus.

Art by kenney.nl

Music by Kevin MacLeod

"Voice Over Under" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
